title: Land for Sale in Athurugiriya Town
details:
Land for sale in Athurugiriya Town

10 perch land - Less than 200m to Athurugiriya Town
This land is situated in a highly developed area in Athurugiriya town
Calm, quiet and Highly residential area.
Water, Electricity and SLT line facilities
Retaining wall is build on two sides, other sides are flat areas

Price - 750,000 per perch
price is negotiable
